General.Name: Selina Hospitality PLC Ordinary Shares
General.Description: Selina Hospitality PLC operates as a hospitality company in Australia, Asia, the United States of America, Mexico, Central America, South America, Europe, Israel, and Africa. Its portfolio includes lifestyle and experiential Millennial- and Gen Z-focused hotels with 118 destinations in 24 countries across 6 continents. The company was founded in 2014 and is headquartered in London, the United Kingdom.
General.Address: 2 London Wall Place, London, United Kingdom, EC2Y 5AU
